name: Armory League
description:
Soccer with weapons! Score a ball into the opponent's goal with a variety of weapons, shooting at the ball. At the moment there are laser, rocket and pinpong weapons. Play on interactive maps in which you need to interact with objects to win.
Play online multiplayer with real players. Train, increase your skill alone in the training area.Features• Five game locations.
• Three types of weapons.
• Interactive locations.
• Singleplayer on Training area.
• Multiplayer of 3 vs 3 players.
